sub_title: Product Marketing | Strategic Marketing | Freelance Graphic & Product Designer
summary: Dynamic marketing professional with a proven track record in strategic and product marketing, complemented by extensive experience in the IT, consultancy, and the BIM industry. Passionate about leveraging technology and innovation, I align marketing strategies with business objectives to create impactful solutions that resonate with target audiences. As a freelance graphic designer and UX/UI professional, I expand my skills while driving success for various clients. Member of ABLE (the Association of Bulgarian Leaders and Entrepreneurs) and a mentor in various programs.

projects: [{'title': 'MA Thesis "Imaging and Imagining Security: Understanding the term through the prism of Visual Art"', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': 'This thesis investigates visualization, art, and imaging in relation to the field of security in International Relations and more specifically, to the perception about the term throughout time in different parts of the world, by identifying and analyzing the symbols used to portray the term.
